title: Feet body arms and skin speaks
transcript: people on the day of judgment do they speak with their tongues or only with their skin and limbs everything will speak but when usually yes they will speak with the tongues but when they lie Allah makes their feet their arms their bodies Their Skin speak and testify against them so they would say to their limbs and skins we were trying to protect you why do you expose us like this because they say Allah made us say
